title: BANVIE 2 Way Motorcycle Security Alarm System with Remote Engine Start (100% Original OEM from SPY Motorcycle Alarm Factory)
feature: // this product is 100% original OEM from SPY alarm factory. Remote start engine and cut off engine.
2-way long transmitting range and real time monitoring motorcycle status.
LCD color backlight changed and sounding against alert
With microwave sensor to detect any illegal approach.
Built-in vibration sensor, sensitivity adjustable by remote.
description: 1. Alarm 2. Silent Arm 3. Disarm 4. Shock Warning 5. Microwave sensor detecting (included) 6. ACC on Trigger 7. Siren pause 8. Alarm Reminding 9. Anti-hijacking 10. Remote engine start 11. Remote engine cut off 12. Auto-Rearm(Anti-false disarm) 13. Motorcycle Locating 14. Power off memory 15. Day & Night Monitoring 16. Emergency disarm 17. LED Indicator 18. Signal Indicator 19. Special music reminding for no action 20. Power status indication 21. Time,alarm setting 22. Transmitter Vibration sensitivity Adjusting 23. Code Learning Working Frequency:433~434MHZ Modulated way:FSK Brain Unit: Working Voltage: 12v±3v State Current: ≤6mA Sound Lever: 110-125dB Remote Control : Working Voltage:1.1-1.6v Static current:≤100uA 1 X Brain unit 1 X Horn 2 X Remote control 1 X LED Indicator 2 X Wire harness 1 X Microwave sensor 1 X English user manual 1. The alarm does not include the 3A battery for remote control, you can get it in your any local store,and it is very cheaper. 2. It is highly recommended to install this product by a professional technician. 3. The operating range of this system may be affected by the weather conditions,nearby radio stations,structures around the motorcycle etc,.
